name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】1st兎田ぺこらいぶ「うさぎ the MEGAMI!!」【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [RhUrYtAWENI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Introduction showcasing concert merchandise promotion slides for 'Usagi the MEGAMI!!'.
Event title logo animation on a decorative background.
Community fan art montage accompanied by an instrumental medley of original songs.
Intermission screen featuring Usada Pekora illustration and the performance hashtag.
Extended merchandise promotion loop including a special 'Support Set' highlight.
